title: Deeper Hedging: A New Agent-based Model for Effective Deep Hedging. (arXiv:2310.18755v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: We propose the Chiarella-Heston model, a new agent-based model for improving the effectiveness of deep hedging strategies. This model includes momentum traders, fundamental traders, and volatility traders. The volatility traders participate in the market by innovatively following a Heston-style volatility signal. The proposed model generalises both the extended Chiarella model and the Heston stochastic volatility model, and is calibrated to reproduce as many empirical stylized facts as possible. According to the stylised facts distance metric, the proposed model is able to reproduce more realistic financial time series than three baseline models: the extended Chiarella model, the Heston model, and the Geometric Brownian Motion. The proposed model is further validated by the Generalized Subtracted L-divergence metric. With the proposed Chiarella-Heston model, we generate a training dataset to train a deep hedging agent for optimal hedging strategies under various transaction cost levels

translated_title: 更深层次对冲: 一种提高深度对冲策略有效性的新型基于agent的模型。
translated_abstract: 我们提出了Chiarella-Heston模型，一种新的基于agent的模型，用于改进深度对冲策略的有效性。该模型包括动量交易者、基本交易者和波动交易者。波动交易者通过创新地遵循Heston风格的波动率信号参与市场。所提出的模型广义地推广了扩展的Chiarella模型和Heston随机波动率模型，并通过校准以尽可能多地复现经验风格数据。根据经验风格距离度量，所提出的模型能够比三个基准模型：扩展的Chiarella模型、Heston模型和几何布朗运动模型，更真实地复现金融时间序列。所提出的模型还通过广义减法L-散度度量进行了验证。利用所提出的Chiarella-Heston模型，我们生成了一个训练数据集，用于训练在不同交易成本水平下的最优对冲策略的深度对冲agent。
tldr: 通过提出Chiarella-Heston模型，我们实现了更深层次的对冲策略，该模型包含了动量交易者、基本交易者和波动交易者，并通过创新地模拟Heston风格的波动率信号。该模型能够更真实地复现金融时间序列，同时提供了最优对冲策略的训练数据集。
en_tdlr: By proposing the Chiarella-Heston model, we achieve deeper hedging strategies, which include momentum traders, fundamental traders, and volatility traders, with an innovative simulation of Heston-style volatility signal. The model can reproduce financial time series more realistically and provides a training dataset for optimal hedging strategies.
